title: Federal Judges Use Judicial Activism or Restraint

content.question: How judges view their role as jurists can influence their decision-making. Some judges believe in judicial activism, while others believe in judicial restraint. Take a position on whether federal judges should exercise judicial activism or restraint. Use at least one piece of evidence from one of the following foundational documents: Brutus 1 The Federalist 51 The Fourteenth Amendment of the United States Constitution In your response you should do the following: ✓ Respond to the prompt with a defensible claim or thesis that establishes a line of reasoning. ✓ Support your claim with at least TWO pieces of specific and relevant evidence. • One piece of evidence must come from one of the foundational documents listed above. • A second piece of evidence can come from any other foundational document not used as your first piece of evidence, or it may come from your knowledge of course concepts. ✓ Use reasoning to explain why your evidence supports your claim or thesis.
